/** * The Transaction Value without Commissions. The cash flow of individual {@link TransactionType * TransactionTypes} is as follows: *
    *
  • SELL / CREDIT / INTREST_RECEIVED / DIVIDEND / REFUND: positive cash flow
    • *
  • BUY / EXPIRATION / DEBIT / INTREST_PAID / FEES: negative cash flow
    • *
  • REBALANCE / TRANSFER: depending on sign of quantity
    • *
* @return java.math.BigDecimal */ public abstract java.math.BigDecimal getGrossValue(); /** * @see #getGrossValue * @return double */ public abstract double getGrossValueDouble(); /** * The Transaction Value incl. Commissions and Fees.The cash flow of individual {@link * TransactionType TransactionTypes} is as follows: *
    *
  • SELL / CREDIT / INTREST_RECEIVED / DIVIDEND / REFUND: positive cash flow
    • *
  • BUY / EXPIRATION / DEBIT / INTREST_PAID / FEES: negative cash flow
    • *
  • REBALANCE / TRANSFER: depending on sign of quantity
    • *
* @return java.math.BigDecimal */ public abstract java.math.BigDecimal getNetValue(); /** * @see #getNetValue * @return double */ public abstract double getNetValueDouble(); /** * ClearingCommission plus ExecutionCommission plus Fee * @return java.math.BigDecimal */ public abstract java.math.BigDecimal getTotalCharges(); /** * @see #getTotalCharges * @return double */ public abstract double getTotalChargesDouble(); /** * The Currency Attribution of this Transaction. * For all Security Types except Forex, the entire transaction value (price + commission) is * booked in transaction currency. For Forex Attributions are: *
    *
  • gross transaction value is booked in transaction currency
    • *
  • execution commission is booked in baseCurrency (this is IB specific!)
    • *
  • clearing commission is booked in transaction currency
    • *
* @return java.util.Collection */ public abstract java.util.Collection getAttributions(); /** * Returns {@code true} if the Transaction is either a {@code BUY}, {@code SELL}, {@code * EXPIRATION} or {@code TRANSFER}. * @return boolean */ public abstract boolean isTrade(); /** * Returns {@code true}, if the Transaction influences the performance calculation. * For BASE these are DEBIT and CREDIT and for strategies this is only REBALANCE. * @return boolean */ public abstract boolean isPerformanceRelevant();
A transaction stored in the database. Each Fill is recorded as a transaction using this entity. In addition the table transaction also stores transactions like intrest, debit, credit fees.

property.name: uuid
property.meta: auto generated unique identifier. Combinations do not have any other natural identifiers.

property.name: settlementDate
property.meta: The dateTime this Transaction gets settled

property.name: quantity
property.meta:
The quantity of the Transaction. For different {@link TransactionType TransactionTypes} quantities are as follows:
  • BUY: pos
  • SELL: neg
  • EXPIRATION: pos/neg
  • TRANSFER : pos/neg
  • CREDIT: 1
  • INTREST_RECEIVED: 1
  • REFUND : 1
  • DIVIDEND : 1
  • DEBIT: -1
  • INTREST_PAID: -1
  • FEES: -1

property.name: price
property.meta: The price of this Transaction. Is always positive

property.name: executionCommission
property.meta: The Execution Commission of this Transaction.

property.name: clearingCommission
property.meta: The Clearing Commission of this Transaction.

property.name: fee
property.meta: The Exchange Fees of this Transaction.

property.name: description
property.meta: An arbitrary Description of the Transaction

many-to-one.name: position
many-to-one.meta:
A position of a particular security owned by a particular strategy. For each opening transaction a position is created. The position object remains in place even if a corresponding closing transaction is carried out and the quantity of the position becomes 0.

Since some values (e.g. {@code marketValue}) depend on whether the position is long or short, aggregated position values for the same security (of different strategies) cannot be retrieved just by adding position values from the corresponding strategies.

Example:

  • Security: VIX Dec 2012
  • Current Bid: 16.50
  • Current Ask: 16.60
  • Strategy A: quantity +10 marketValue: 10 * 1000 * 16.50 = 165'000
  • Strategy B: quantity -10 marketValue: 10 * 1000 * 16.60 = -166'000

The sum of above marketValues would be -1'000 which is obviously wrong.

As a consequence the {@code PortfolioDAO} provides lookup-methods that aggregate positions from the same security (of different strategies) in the correct manner.
